title: Klein and Luna on Abolition in Brazil- development

content.question: Which of the following was a development in the history of slavery in Brazil?

choices.label: Most people brought to Brazil from Africa were of the Islamic faith.
Enslaved Africans in Brazil generally did not work in plantation agriculture.
Enslaved people applied knowledge developed in Africa to rice cultivation in Brazil.
More enslaved Africans arrived in Brazil than in any other place in the Americas.

content.answer: More enslaved Africans arrived in Brazil than in any other place in the Americas.

topic.text: 2.16: Diasporic Connections: Slavery and Freedom in Brazil

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
